title: A Guide to Turning Postmodernism Against Itself
description:
I look at some aspects in the deconstruction project of Jacques Derrida and give a few strategies for taking the upside world created by postmodernism and putting it back on its feet.  

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
